dialog.text: Got some texts from Pete today - don't you hate it when that happens!  He says he wants me back and misses me.  I suppose I miss him too.  Mum said to move on but I haven't decided if I am going to message him back - not yet anyway. How did you get on this week on your project?

I am on a bit of a roll - Mum is working four days a week so I have the house to myself.  I managing to put a decent number of hours in now so I hope I can get something in by end of term. Have you tried any LeetCode problems yet?

I only managed another 1 from Wednesday.  I accidentally tried a medium one and gave up after 2 hours!  Think I need to stick to the easy ones for now :smiley:  Ah, need to finish this last project task off before work tomorrow - catch you later!
